content: What are the possible ways to utilize Scala for analyzing the latest satellite-based data on the rise in sea level? Also, what can be the potential insights derived from this analysis that could facilitate the development of effective measures to tackle the global issue of climate change? Could you please provide a code snippet in Latex that can be leveraged for processing and analyzing this data? Furthermore, how can we incorporate data from additional sources, such as temperature and ocean current measurements, to gain a more comprehensive understanding of the factors contributing to the surge in sea level and accordingly improve our efforts to alleviate its impact?
